# Optional Accessories

The camera can be used with the following optional accessories available from Fujifilm. For information on other accessories, see “Accessories from Fujifilm” (pg. 288).

## The AR-X100 Adapter Ring

1. **Remove the front ring.**

   !Removing the Front Ring

   > 💡 **Tip:**  
   > If you have trouble removing the front ring, grip the entire ring and rotate it as shown.

   !Grip and Rotate

2. **Attach the adapter ring as shown, with the projections facing out.**

   !Attaching the Adapter Ring

   > 💡 **Note:**  
   > - Keep the front ring and lens cap in a safe place when not in use.  
   > - Attach the adapter ring AR-X100 before attaching LH-X100 lens hood, PRF-49/PRF-49S protector filter, or third-party filters.
